senses.de: To take additional steps or to continue a process after an event or situation.
senses.ex: She will follow up the meeting with a detailed report.

Tips.title: Continued Interest
Tips.description: Use 'follow up' to show you're keeping engaged or interested in the topic or task.
Tips.example: After our conversation, I'll follow up with an email.

Tips.title: Action Oriented
Tips.description: 'Follow up' implies you're moving forward with steps towards a goal.
Tips.example: Let's follow up next week to see if our strategy worked.

senses.de: An action or thing that continues something that has already been started or that comes after something else that you have done.
senses.ex: The doctor will give you a follow-up appointment next week.

Tips.title: Sequential Process
Tips.description: A 'follow-up' often comes after an initial action or meeting.
Tips.example: The interview went well, my follow-up is scheduled for Monday.

Tips.title: Reminder
Tips.description: Use 'follow-up' to gently remind someone about a shared matter.
Tips.example: I'm sending a follow-up message about our pending deal.

senses.de: To check or investigate the current situation or the outcomes after an event, usually to see if further action is needed.
senses.ex: The doctor will follow up the patient after the surgery to check his recovery.

Tips.title: Care and Attention
Tips.description: In medical contexts, 'follow up' shows ongoing care for a patient's condition.
Tips.example: Your follow-up treatment starts in two weeks.

Tips.title: Assess Progress
Tips.description: Use 'follow up' to check on progress after an initial event or treatment.
Tips.example: We'll follow up next month to review your recovery.

senses.de: To take additional action about something, often in order to be sure that it is successful.
senses.ex: We need to follow up the sales presentation with a client meeting.

Tips.title: Ensure Success
Tips.description: In business, 'follow up' is about making sure things are moving forward and succeeding.
Tips.example: After you submit the proposal, follow up with a call.

Tips.title: Show Initiative
Tips.description: Following up shows that you take initiative and are proactive in business situations.
Tips.example: I'll follow up with the team to expedite the project's timeline.
